concept.description: Propagates dependencies declared by Pom descriptor to artifacts.
concept.cypher: call apoc.periodic.iterate( "MATCH (pom:Effective:Pom), (pom)-[:DESCRIBES]->(artifact:Artifact), (pom)-[:DECLARES_DEPENDENCY]->(dependency:Dependency)-[:TO_ARTIFACT]->(dependencyArtifact:Artifact) RETURN artifact, dependency, dependencyArtifact", "MERGE (artifact)-[dependsOn:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependencyArtifact) SET dependsOn.scope = dependency.scope, dependsOn.optional = dependency.optional", {}) YIELD total as `Artifact Dependencies`

concept.description: Converts the lastModified timestamp attribute of Artifacts to a String representation (for GraphML reports).
concept.cypher: MATCH (artifact:Artifact) WHERE exists(artifact.lastModified) SET artifact.lastModificationTime = toString(datetime({epochMillis:artifact.lastModified})) REMOVE artifact.lastModified RETURN count(artifact)

concept.description: Creates reports about dependencies as GraphML file and PlantUML component diagram.
concept.cypher: MATCH (platform:Artifact) WHERE platform.fqn = $platformArtifact SET platform:Platform RETURN platform as `Platform Artifact`

concept.description: Creates reports about dependencies as GraphML file and PlantUML component diagram.
Creates a CSV report about dependency versions.
concept.cypher: MATCH (platform:Platform:Artifact)-[d:DEPENDS_ON*]->(dependency:Artifact) RETURN dependency.group as GroupId, dependency.name as ArtifactId, collect(distinct dependency.version) as Version ORDER BY GroupId, ArtifactId

concept.description: Creates a `Specification` per unique groupId/artifactId and associates the the artifacts, i.e. `(:Specification)-[:CONTAINS_ARTIFACT]->(:Artifact)`.
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Repository)-[:CONTAINS_ARTIFACT]->(artifact) MERGE (specification:Specification {name: artifact.name}) MERGE (specification)-[:CONTAINS_ARTIFACT]->(artifact) RETURN count(*)

concept.description: Creates reports about dependencies between specifications as GraphML file and PlantUML component diagram.
concept.cypher: MATCH (platform:Platform:Artifact)-[dependsOn:DEPENDS_ON*0..]->(dependency:Artifact), (specification:Specification)-[:CONTAINS_ARTIFACT]->(dependency) RETURN { role : "graph", parent: specification, nodes: collect(dependency), relationships: dependsOn }
